
 
# Tobit Radio FX Pro: A Software for Recording and Playing Internet Radio
 
Tobit Radio FX Pro is a software that allows you to record and play internet radio stations on your PC. You can also link the recorded tracks with cover pictures, lyrics and video clips, and create your own compilations with your favorite tunes. Tobit Radio FX Pro supports thousands of radio stations from around the world, and lets you customize your listening experience with various features and settings.
 
Tobit Radio FX Pro 6 00a 1394 is the latest version of the software, which was released in 2022. It has some improvements and bug fixes over the previous versions, and it is compatible with Windows 10, 8.1, 8, 7, Vista and XP. You can download Tobit Radio FX Pro 6 00a 1394 for free from the developer's website[^4^], or from other sources such as Kit[^1^], SoundCloud[^2^], or OpenSea[^6^]. However, you should always check the downloaded files with a reliable antivirus program before installing them.

If you are looking for a software that can help you enjoy internet radio on your PC, Tobit Radio FX Pro might be a good option for you. It is easy to use, has a lot of features and supports a wide range of radio stations. You can also share your recordings and compilations with your friends and family, or upload them to online platforms. Tobit Radio FX Pro is a software that can bring you closer to the music you love.

- **Recording:** You can record any track from any radio station with a single click, and save it in MP3 format on your PC. You can also schedule recordings for later, or record multiple stations at once.
- **Linking:** You can link the recorded tracks with cover pictures, lyrics and video clips from the internet, and view them on your PC or on your mobile device. You can also edit the tags and information of the tracks, and add your own comments and ratings.
- **Playing:** You can play the recorded tracks on your PC or on your mobile device, and enjoy them with high-quality sound. You can also create playlists, shuffle tracks, repeat tracks, and adjust the volume and equalizer settings.
- **Browsing:** You can browse through thousands of radio stations from around the world, sorted by genre, country, language, popularity and more. You can also search for specific stations or tracks, and add them to your favorites.
- **Customizing:** You can customize your Tobit Radio FX Pro software with various skins, themes, colors and fonts. You can also change the language, the units, the time format and other settings.

Tobit Radio FX Pro is a software that offers you a lot of features and options to enjoy internet radio on your PC. Whether you want to record, play, link, browse or customize, Tobit Radio FX Pro has something for you.
